response.message: Amazing, I'm sure Ask Ubuntu will become one of the most successful sites ot the network!
Your closing paragraph was incredibly touching.  Thank you for bringing a fresh perspective to our humble event, and a warm welcome to the Ubuntu community.

I've been watching Ubuntu since it's early days, and it appears to me the most vibrant of all FLOSS communities, thanks to guys like Shuttleworth and Jono Bacon. These guys are great community builders, and it's impressive to see them working with the StackExchange guys (who themselves also are great at that elusive task). Rock on guys! This is collaboration at it's best.

I heard that there was some discussion on an offline viewer that used the data dumps.

I have started a project to mitigate this and you can find more details here:

http://meta.askubuntu.com/questions/708/what-type-of-information-do-we-want-presented-in-offline-data-dump-viewer
